review: Can't believe we waited as long as we did to pick one up. It's great for the bedroom t.v. to use our Prime membership as well as Netflix and Hulu. We quit cable a long time ago so some of the free offerings on it are fun to have as well. The remote is so simple that even my technologically challenged wife finds it easy to use. We'll definitely give the voice remote a try when we get our next Stick for our other t.v.
author: Mopjockey

review: It's just like they said, very easy to set up, it is a great item
author: Randy Zimmer

review: Although it took forever to get to us. (ordered in dec got it in march) this thing is perfect! Hit the home button and it will automatically switch my tv over to the correct HDMI channel. We use this thing more then we watch cable at this point! I really like that it has a remote, coming from a chromecast and all the BS that goes along with connecting to the wifi, trying to get the phone and unit to synch, having the program crash the phone etc. This allows me to just use the remote and avoid all that!
